tuv.seg: Life skills training for people with vision impairments
Bunchúrsa do dhaoine le lagú amhairc
The National Council for the Blind of Ireland (NCBI) offers a rehabilitation programme entitled Learning for life for people with a significant degree of sight loss
Cuireann Comhairle Náisiúnta na hÉireann do na Daill (CNÉD) cúrsa athshlánúcháin ar fáil ar a dtugtar Foghlaim don Saol. Tá sé dírithe ar dhaoine a bhfuil lagú suntasach ar an amharc acu
This includes individuals with impaired vision since birth and those whose vision impairment has occurred later in life (for example, as a result of an accident, illness, or a progressive disorder)

Tugtar san áireamh daoine a bhfuil lagú ar a n-amharc ón mbroinn agus daoine ar tharla an lagú ar a n-amharc tráth is faide amach ina saol (mar shampla, de bharr timpiste, tinnis nó galair bhreisithigh)
The aim of the programme is to maximise the quality of life and independence of trainees in accordance with their own wishes
Tá d’aidhm ag an gclár go mbeadh caighdeán saoil agus neamhspleáchas ag na hoiliúnaithe chomh maith agus is féidir, de réir mar is toil leo féin
Core elements of the course include mobility, technology training, and daily living skills
Tá gluaisteacht, traenáil sa teicneolaíocht agus gnáthscileanna maireachtála ina ngnéithe lárnacha den chúrsa
The programme aims to provide trainees with the skills, knowledge and attitude required to access further education and training
Féachtar leis an gclár seo go bhfaigheadh na hoiliúnaithe scileanna, eolas agus meon is gá chun breis oideachais agus oiliúna a fháil
The course is open to anyone who is eligible to apply
Tá cead ar an gcúrsa ag aon duine atá i dteideal cur isteach air

No previous educational or other qualifications are necessary to do the course; likewise, applicants will not be excluded from the course if they do have educational or other qualifications or are working
Níl gá le haon cháilíochtaí oideachais ná eile chun an cúrsa a leanacht; ar an gcaoi chéanna, ní choscfar an cúrsa ar iarrthóirí a bhfuil cáilíochtaí oideachais nó eile acu nó atá ag obair
You can find more information in our document about working with a disability
Faigh tuilleadh faisnéise inár gcáipéis Ag obair faoi mhíchumas
The foundation course is open to people with a significant degree of sight loss
Tá cead ar an mbunchúrsa ag daoine a bhfuil méid suntasach den amharc caillte acu
The content of the course is divided into several sections. These include:
Roinntear ábhar an chúrsa i gcodanna éagsúla, ina measc:
You can find further information on mobility training for people with visual impairment here
Tá tuilleadh eolais maidir le hoiliúint sa ghluaisteacht do dhaoine le lagú amhairc

If trainees have completed areas of the course that are eligible for certification (for example, computer skills), certificates will be awarded to trainees through Quality and Qualifications Ireland (QQI)

Má chríochnaíonn oiliúnaithe réimsí den chúrsa a bhfuiltear i dteideal teastais maidir leo (scileanna ríomhaireachta, mar shampla) bronnfar teastais ar na hoiliúnaithe trí Dhearbhú Cáilíochta agus Cáilíochtaí Éireann (DCCE)

There is an Employment Officer on-site at the NCBI, who will assist trainees in their job-seeking endeavours (for example, career guidance, preparation of CVs, help finding work placements, advice, etc.) but it is up to individual trainees to source future employment

Tá Oifigeach Fostaíochta san ionad ag CNÉD, a chuideoidh leis na hoiliúnaithe san iarracht post a aimsiú (mar shampla, treoir ghairme, ullmhú CV, cúnamh le socraíochtaí oibre a aimsiú, comhairle, agus araile) ach is faoin duine féin é fostaíocht a fháil
The course is free of charge
Conas iarratas a dhéanamh
